name: .RPGSAVE File Extension
summary: Learn about .RPGSAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An RPGSAVE file contains save information for a game created by RPG Maker MV, a program used to create role-playing games (RPG). It stores game save information in JSON format, which includes the character age, the month and year, and collected items, weapons, and armor.

content: RPGSAVE files are typically created and referenced by a game made using RPG Maker MV. Most users will not come across this file type. However, users can upload and modify RPGSAVE files using Online Save Editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
